price: 62. Zij zeiden: “Ben jij degene die dit onze goden heeft aangedaan, o, Ibraahiem?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
